mapper.insert: insert into user_table (user_id, user_name, user_pw, user_phone, user_mail, user_birth, user_gender) values (#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_pw}, #{user_phone}, CONCAT(#{user_mail_id},'@',#{user_mail_domain}), #{user_birth}, #{user_gender})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_table where user_id = #{user_id}
select id, user_id from user_table where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
select * from user_table where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pass = #{user_pass}
select count(*) from user_table where user_phone = #{user_phone}
mapper.update: update user_table set user_pw = #{user_pw} where user_id = #{user_id}
update user_table set user_pw = #{user_pw} where user_mail = #{user_mail} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_table where user_mail = #{user_mail} and user_id = #{user_id}
